# preventsCapture

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the layer protects against screen capture.

## Declaration

```swift
var preventsCapture: Bool { get set }
```

## Protecting content

- **isOutputObscuredDueToInsufficientExternalProtection**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system obscures decoded output due to insufficient external protection on the current device.
